chapter.text: ovvoru manitanukkum (ulakil avan velivaruvatarku) munnar oru kalam cellavillaiya? Atil avan, inna porul enrum kuruvatarkillata nilaimaiyil iruntan
(pinnar an, pen) kalanta or intiriyat tuliyaik kontu niccayamaka namtan manitanaip pataittom. Avanai nam cotippatarkakave, ceviyutaiyavanakavum parvaiyutaiyavanakavum avanai akkinom
pinnar, niccayamaka nam avanukku nerana valiyaiyum arivittom. Eninum, (ataip pinparri namakku) nanri celuttupavarkalum irukkinranar. (Atai) nirakarittuvitupavarkalum irukkinranar
nirakarippavarkalukku nam cankilikalaiyum, (kai, kal) vilankukalaiyum, narakattaiyum niccayamaka tayarpatutti vaittirukkirom
nallavarkal, kinnankalilulla karpuram kalanta panattai aruntuvarkal
atu (contamaka) allahvutaiya (nal) atiyarkal aruntuvatarkaka erpatta or urrin nirakum. Atai avarkal (tankal virumpiya itamellam) otac ceyvarkal
ivarkal (tankal) nerccaikalaiyum niraiverruvarkal. Ninta vetanaiyutaiya (marumai) nalai payantukolvarkal
melum, allahvin mitulla anpin karanamaka elaikalukkum, anataikalukkum, ciraippattavarkalukkum unavalipparkal
(Tam'mitam perupavarkalai nokki) ‘‘nam unkalukku unavalippatellam allahvin mukattirkakattan. Unkalitam nam oru kuliyaiyo allatu (ninkal namakku) nanri celuttuvataiyo karutavillai (enrum)
‘‘niccayamaka nankal enkal iraivanin oru nalaip parrip payappatukirom. Annalil mukam katukatuttuc cunti vitum'' (enrum kuruvarkal)
akave, allah attakaiya nalin tinkiliruntu avarkalai patukattuk kontu, avarkalutaiya mukattil makilcciyaiyum, celippaiyum kotuttan
melum, avarkal im'maiyil (ciramankalaic) cakittuk kontiruntatan karanamakac corkkattaiyum, (anivatarkup) pattataikalaiyum avarkalukkuk kuliyakak kotuttan (enru kurappatum)
(avarkal) ankulla kattilkalin mitu(lla pancanaikalin mel) cayntu kontirupparkal. Atil curiya veppattaiyum, paniyin kotiya kulircciyaiyum kana mattarkal
atilulla (marankalin) nilalkal avarkal mitu talntu (culntu) kontirukkum. Atan kanikal (culapamakap parikkakkutiya vitattil) avarkal mun cayntu varum
(palavakai inpamana panankal nirainta) palinkuk kentikalum, vellik kinnankalum avarkal mun currik konte irukkum
(avai palinkukalalla; eninum,) palinkukalaip pol velliyinal (avarkalin avaciyattirkut) takkavaru nirmanikkappattullana
(inci kalanta) ‘canjapil' ennum (mikka uyarntatoru) panamum anku avarkalukkup pukattappatum
atu ankulla or urrin nir, atarku ‘salsapil' enrum peyar kurappatum
(Enrume) ciruvarkalaka irukkakkutiya paniyalarkal avarkalaic currikkonte tirivarkal. (Napiye!) Avarkalai nir kantal citariya muttukkal enre karutuvir
pinnum kavanittup parttal, periya araca malikaiyil ulla cukapokankalaiyellam nir (ankuk) kanpir

avarkal tekattin mel melliya pacum pattataiyo allatu tatippana (pala nira) pattataiyo irukkum. (Virutaka) vellik kappum avarkalukku anivikkappatum. Paricuttamana oru panattaiyum avarkalin iraivan avarkalukkup pukattuvan
(avarkalai nokki) ‘‘niccayamaka itu unkalukkuk kuliyaka kotukkappattatu; unkal muyarciyum ankikarikkappattatu'' (enrum kuruvan)
(napiye!) Niccayamaka nam inta kur'anaic ciritu ciritakave um'mitu irakki vaikkirom
akave, umatu iraivanin kattalaiyai (perruk kolla) nir poruttiruppiraka. Avarkalilulla pavikalaiyum, nanri kettavarkalaiyum nir pinparratir
kalaiyilum malaiyilum unkal iraivanin tirunamattai(k kuri) ninaivu kuruviraka
iravilum, avanukkuc ciram panintu vananki, iravu nerattil netuneram avanait tuti ceytu kontiruppiraka
niccayamaka inta makkal im'maiyai virumpi, avarkalukku munnirukkum (marumaiyin) katinamana nalaip purakkanittu vitukinranar
namtan avarkalaip pataittom. Namtan avarkalutaiya amaippaiyum urutippatuttinom. Nam natinal (avarkalai) marri avarkalaip ponra marravarkalai (avarkal itattil) amarttivituvom
niccayamaka itu oru nallupatecamakum. Virumpiyavar tan iraivan pakkam cellakkutiya (nerana) valiyaip palamakap pitittuk kollavum
Eninum, allah natinal tavira ninkal (etaiyum) virumpa mutiyatu. Niccayamaka allah (unkal anaivarin tanmaikalaiyum) nankarintavanaka, nanamutaiyavanaka irukkiran
(akave, unkalil) avan virumpiyavarkalait tan arulil pukutti vitukiran. Aniyayakkararkalukkut tunpuruttum vetanaiyaittan tayarpatutti vaittirukkiran
